tasks.title: create confirmPoll cloud function
tasks.description: implement backend function to handle poll confirmation with winner calculation
tasks.details:
create functions/src/ai/confirmPoll.ts:

1. verify user is poll creator (compare userId to metadata.createdBy)
2. verify poll status is 'active' (not already confirmed/cancelled)
3. calculate winning option by counting votes in metadata.votes
4. handle ties (most votes wins, or first option if truly tied)
5. update poll document:
   - pollStatus = 'confirmed'
   - winningOption = calculated winner
   - confirmedBy = userId
   - confirmedAt = serverTimestamp
6. create new decision document with:
   - type: 'decision'
   - content: formatted decision text
   - metadata.pollId: original poll id
   - metadata.winningOption
   - metadata.voteCount
   - metadata.totalVotes
   - metadata.consensusReached: boolean
7. post system message to chat announcing decision
8. send FCM notifications to all participants
9. extensive logging at each step
10. error handling for all edge cases

export function in functions/src/index.ts

curl -X POST [function-url] -d '{"conversationId": "test", "pollId": "test", "userId": "test"}'
verify poll status updates in firestore
verify decision document created
verify system message posted

tasks.title: modify confirmSchedulingSelection to NOT auto-finalize
tasks.description: update existing function to record votes without auto-finalizing when all vote
tasks.details:
modify functions/src/ai/schedulingConfirmation.ts:

current behavior:
- auto-finalizes when voteCount >= participantIds.length

new behavior:
- record vote in poll.metadata.votes (keep this)
- check if all participants voted (keep this)
- if all voted:
  - send message: 'all votes recorded! waiting for creator to confirm'
  - do NOT finalize
  - do NOT create decision
  - do NOT dismiss poll
- if not all voted:
  - send message: 'vote recorded! waiting for X more people'

remove lines 142-230 (auto-finalization logic)
replace with simple acknowledgment message
keep vote recording logic intact
tasks.testStrategy:
create poll with 3 participants
all 3 vote
verify poll does NOT auto-finalize
verify message says 'waiting for creator to confirm'
verify poll stays active in decisions tab

tasks.title: comprehensive testing with iOS Simulator MCP
tasks.description: run all 7 test cases with 3 simulators and capture screenshots
tasks.details:
use iOS Simulator MCP to test:

test 1: full consensus
- 3 simulators: user a (creator), user b, user c
- create group chat with all 3
- user a creates poll with 3 time options
- all users vote for same option
- verify user a sees confirm/cancel buttons
- verify users b and c see 'waiting for creator' message
- verify users b and c do NOT see buttons
- user a clicks confirm decision
- verify toast notification on all 3 devices
- verify decision entry appears in all 3 decisions tabs
- verify poll shows as confirmed on all devices
- take screenshots showing flow on all 3 devices

test 2: cancel poll
- same 3 simulators
- user a creates poll
- users b and c cast votes
- user a clicks cancel poll
- verify confirmation dialog appears
- user a confirms cancellation
- verify toast notification on all devices
- verify poll disappears from decisions tab
- take screenshots of cancellation flow

test 3: partial voting
- user a creates poll
- only users a and b vote (user c doesn't vote)
- user a should still see confirm/cancel buttons
- user a confirms decision
- verify decision shows '2/3 participants voted'
- take screenshots showing partial vote confirmation

test 4: tied votes
- user a creates poll with 3 options
- each user votes for different option (3-way tie)
- user a sees confirm/cancel buttons
- user a can confirm any option (acts as tiebreaker)
- verify decision records which option was chosen
- take screenshots

test 5: creator confirms immediately
- user a creates poll
- user a immediately clicks confirm decision before anyone votes
- verify it works and creates decision with '1/3 votes'
- users b and c see confirmed decision, can't vote anymore
- take screenshots

test 6: real-time sync
- all 3 simulators have decisions tab open simultaneously
- user a creates poll
- verify it appears on all devices within 2 seconds (check timestamps)
- user b casts vote
- verify vote count updates on all devices in real-time
- user a confirms
- verify UI updates to confirmed state on all devices immediately
- take screenshots showing real-time sync working

test 7: multiple polls
- user a creates poll 1 about meeting time
- user a creates poll 2 about lunch location
- verify both polls visible in decisions tab
- users b and c vote on both polls
- user a confirms poll 1
- verify poll 2 still active
- user a confirms poll 2
- verify both show as confirmed decisions
- take screenshots

document results:
- all screenshots in docs/screenshots/poll_confirmation/
- create docs/POLL_CONFIRMATION_TEST_RESULTS.md
- list any bugs found
- verify all acceptance criteria met
tasks.testStrategy:
run each test case systematically
capture screenshots at each step
verify no console errors
verify no crashes
verify all acceptance criteria pass
document any issues found
create summary report
